Thomas, pastor of New Hope Baptist Church, where the idea for a high quality school for Newark youth was born. The pastor's wife passed away before the school opened in 1999 but her legacy lives on today in each and every one of the 1,500 students who walk the halls of MPTCS today.
#MPTCSTurns20
